mapper.sql: id, publicId, cardsName, cardImage, receiveDate, deliveryAddr, deliveryType, deliveryType1, numlimit, maxNumType, maxNum, cardMessage, buyMoney, ctIds, gtIds, code, state, titleCard, cardIds, backColor, isCallSms, mobilePhone, cardType, lqId, jifen, fenbi, busId, threeMallId, threeNum, classifyId, isrecommend, giveJifen, giveFenbi, giveMoney, giveFlow
mapper.select: select count(id) from t_duofen_card_receive where busId=#{busId}
select * from t_duofen_card_receive where busId=#{busId} order by id desc limit #{first},#{pageSize}
select * from t_duofen_card_receive where busId=#{busId} and code=#{code}
select * from t_duofen_card_receive where busId=#{busId} and deliveryType=2 and state=1 and (receiveDate>=#{receiveDate} or receiveDate is null) and gtIds like '%${gtId}%' order by id desc
select * from t_duofen_card_receive where id in(select cardReceiveId from t_duofen_card_get where memberId=#{memberId})

select * from t_duofen_card_receive where id in
#{id}
select * from t_duofen_card_receive where id=#{id} and state=1 and (receiveDate>=#{receiveDate} or receiveDate is null) order by id desc
select count(id) from t_duofen_card_receive where busId=#{busId} and deliveryAddr=1 and state=1

SELECT cr.*,pu.authorizer_info FROM t_duofen_card_receive cr INNER JOIN t_wx_public_users pu ON pu.id=cr.publicId WHERE cr.publicId=#{publicId} AND cr.deliveryAddr=1 AND cr.state=1 ORDER BY cr.id DESC limit #{first},#{pageSize}
select from t_duofen_card_receive where busId=#{busId} and deliveryType=3 and state=1
select from t_duofen_card_receive where publicId=#{publicId} and deliveryType=3 and state=1
select id,cardsName,receiveDate from t_duofen_card_receive where busId=#{busId} and deliveryType=1 and numlimit=0 and state=1
select from t_duofen_card_receive where busId=#{busUserId} and state=1 and deliveryAddr=2 and (receiveDate>=#{date} or receiveDate is null)
select from t_duofen_card_receive where busId=#{busUserId} and state=1 and deliveryType=3 and (receiveDate>=#{date} or receiveDate is null)

SELECT cr.gtIds FROM t_duofen_card_receive cr WHERE busId=#{busId} and state=1 AND deliveryType=2 AND (receiveDate >= #{receiveDate} or receiveDate is null) AND cr.id NOT IN (SELECT crId FROM t_duofen_card_receivelog WHERE memberId=#{memberId} GROUP BY crId)

select from t_duofen_card_receive where busId=#{busId} and state=1 and deliveryAddr=2 and deliveryType1=#{deliveryType1} and (receiveDate >= #{receiveDate} or receiveDate is null) order by id desc limit #{first},#{pageSize}

select count(id) from t_duofen_card_receive where busId=#{busId} and state=1 and deliveryAddr=2 and deliveryType1=#{deliveryType1} and (receiveDate >= #{receiveDate} or receiveDate is null) order by id desc
select from t_duofen_card_receive where busId=#{busUserId} and deliveryType=3 and state=1 and (receiveDate >= #{receiveDate} or receiveDate is null)
select from t_duofen_card_receive where id=#{id}
select from t_duofen_card_receive where busId=#{busId} and state=1 and deliveryAddr=2 and deliveryType1=#{deliveryType1} and (receiveDate >= #{receiveDate} or receiveDate is null) order by id desc
select from t_duofen_card_receive where busId=#{busId} and state=1 and deliveryAddr=2 and (receiveDate >= #{receiveDate} or receiveDate is null) order by id desc

select id,cardsName,titleCard,receiveDate from t_duofen_card_receive where busId=#{busId} and deliveryType=1 and numlimit=0 and state=1 and jifen=0 and fenbi=0 and (receiveDate >= #{receiveDate} or receiveDate is null) order by id desc
select id,cardsName from t_duofen_card_receive where busId=#{busId} and deliveryType=5 and numlimit=0 and state=1 and (receiveDate >= #{receiveDate} or receiveDate is null) order by id desc
